name: Roots (8E3eGrM)
description:
It is a puzzle game with the potato as the main character, using the sunlight and water reasonably in the game to grow buds and leaves to reach the goal point with the right shape to take root. The game is complete, with a newbie guide level, simple levels and complex levels of increasing difficulty.

Arrow keys up, down, left and right control the movement of the potatoes, and the P key calls out the button prompt menu. The UI supports both keyboard and mouse for operation.

The game was made by four people in the case of no art designer in 48 hours at Global Game Jam Beijing. Thanks for my teammates' contribution. Enjoy for playing!
